title: Aquarius Habitat Training: Preparing for Underwater Research

comments.text: Interesting find on Aquarius!  While not directly about hyperbaric habitat *materials*, the advanced training program at FIU's Aquarius habitat is highly relevant for hands-on experience with undersea living and the operational realities of a hyperbaric environment – crucial for my underwater city aspirations.
